body.name: Aivalas GPU Support Bracket, Graphics Video Card Brace with Height Adjustable, Anti Sag Holder for Universal Graphics Card Sag, GPU Stand with Magnet and Rubber Pad (White)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Saturday, February 17 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 15 hrs 26 mins
features: Does A Good Job of Preventing GPU Sag - The GPU support bracket can be used to avoid your graphics card from sagging or damaged due to the weight of the card. The appearance of our gpu stand is very unobtrusive and does not detract form the aesthetics of your computer.
Exquisite Workmanship - This video card support bracket is made of premium quality aluminum which is sturdy and not deformed, provides strong and long-lasting support to your VGA Card.

Magnetic Non-Slip Base - Being magnetic, graphics card stand holder is able to stick to the PSU shrouds in cases and has a good degree of extensibility. The bit has rubber on the ends which adds a nice grip to where it’s placed, preventing any slippage.

Basic But Effective Solution - Simply twist the nut of anti sag bracket gpu to adjust height as you need, then place it between the case and your GPU Card. PLEASE make sure the minimum support height is 2-7/8” and the maximum support height 4-3/4”.

Quality Guarantee - Customer satisfaction is of utmost importance to us. We're confident you'll love our gpu sag bracket. If you are not fully satisfied, please contact us, our customer service team will get you taken care of and work with you to make it right!

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.6 4.6 out of 5 stars 328 ratings 4.6 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why Do We Need Graphics Card GPU Brace Support? The graphics card is expensive and large in size, and most chassis do not provide additional graphics card support.This GPU bracket can provide effective support for the graphics card's tail, allowing the expensive graphics card to be horizontal and its failure rate to be reduced.A properly installed graphics card bracket can help to improve the airflow inside the computer case by ensuring that there is enough clearance between the graphics card and other components. This can help to reduce the temperature of the graphics card and other components, leading to better overall system performance.A graphics card bracket can help to protect other components in the computer case from damage caused by the weight and movement of the graphics card. This can help to extend the lifespan of the computer system and reduce the risk of costly repairs.

Screw Adjustment Design Adjustable height to match various computer cases and motherboards. The supportable height range of our gpu riser is 70-120mm. Magnetic Non-Slip Base The magnets in the base of the gpu stand. There are non-slip washers on both sides of the gpu holder, which will not damage the chassis. Versatile Compatibility Our gpu support bracket accommodating both traditional and long power supply bays, to cater to every user's needs. All-aluminum Metal Material Provides strong and long-lasting support. GPU brace support is made of all-aluminum metal, can be used as a long-term replacement.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little stand. Quality metal
reviews.reviewText: Works great, good adjustability. I've used them twice now in my builds just to help support the heavier graphics cards.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just as described
reviews.reviewText: It's a GPU stand. It's metal. It's magnetic. It works and looks good. Buy it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not an exciting part of a PC build, but it does a good job
reviews.reviewText: While this isn't a part people are going to get excited about for a PC build, its a quick and easy way to make sure you don't get a droopy GPU and protect your pcie slot. It's very easy to set up and the magnet and rubber grip on the bottom are nice additions to avoid paint damage and make set up quick.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great value, good quality
reviews.reviewText: This GPU brace, which like most GPU braces prevents sag from large and heavy graphics cards, does exactly what it is supposed to do, but at a price that is significantly lower than most competing products. I paid less than 7 dollars for this, whereas most competitors seem to be in the 10-15 dollar range.The magnetic foot is a nice touch and helps "anchor" the brace to the PSU basement shroud, as is the rubberized top that gives a soft touch where the brace meets the GPU fan shroud.The only downside is that I would have liked the base of the brace to be a little bit wider, with a slightly stronger magnet, but I am being quite nitpicky here.Overall I definitely recommend this product if you have a large GPU that like mine is sagging under its own size and weight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I had one issue, but my own fault
reviews.reviewText: This product is made very well and will work perfectly in most setups. That is if you take the time to measure the minimum and maximum clearance that it will allow for where you need to place it. I unfortunately did not and underestimated the thickness of my RTX 4080. Luckily, it had an extra spot that allowed me to place it at its maximum height and still offer enough support for the card. I will add another piece of rubber padding to increase the height at some point, but for now it will do just fine.Great product, just take the time to measure to make sure it will work for your specific application.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It does its job
reviews.reviewText: Its got a magnet on the bottom to help stick it to the case and is easily adjustable to accommodate the height of any graphics card. Not much else to say, it does its job. And for $10 it does it well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The product quality is really good, I liked the look of it and everything but it was too long to fit in my Corsair 7000d. I have an MSI gaming x trio and unfortunately the gap between the psu bay and the gpu can't fit this brace. I did decide to keep it but unfortunately I can't use it. That's probably my fault for not looking at the length first.Either way, it is still a good product and I would recommend it for anyone who has a 40 series card.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Does what it needs to do.
